title: Change Directory
description: The 'cd' command is used to change the current directory in the file system.
story: Jerry is hiding in a folder located at '/home/jerry/food/cheese'. Tom needs to use the 'cd' command to navigate to the folder and find Jerry.

game.hint: Try using 'cd' followed by the path where Jerry is hiding.

title: Print Working Directory
description: The 'pwd' command prints the current working directory.
story: Tom wants to know where he is in the file system. Using 'pwd' will tell him his current location.

game.hint: Use 'pwd' to check the current directory.

title: List Files
description: The 'ls' command lists all files and directories in the current directory.
story: Tom wants to see what files are in the current directory. Using 'ls' will list all files and directories.

game.hint: Use 'ls' to list the files in the current directory.

title: List  hi karthick
